t: Amazon launches Inspire, a TikTok-like shopping feed that supports both photos and videos | TechCrunch
s: December 8, 2022 - Amazon is bringing a TikTok-like shopping experience to its app. The company today announced the launch of Inspire, a new short-form video and photo feed that allows consumers to explore products and ideas and shop from content created by influencers, brands and other customers.
